document.heading: Executive Service Compensation System Changes and Pay Schedule Approval Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-267, the “Executive Service Compensation System Changes and Pay Schedule Approval Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-855. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 2, 2014, and December 17, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 25, 2015, it was assigned Act No. 20-606 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-267 became effective May 2, 2015.
